label: Stoev, Pavel, Nesrine Akkari, Marzio Zapparoli, David Porco, Henrik Enghoff, Gregory D. Edgecombe, Teodor Georgiev & Lyubomir Penev.  2010. The centipede genus Eupolybothrus Verhoeff, 1907 (Chilopoda: Lithobiomorpha: Lithobiidae) in North Africa, a cybertaxonomic revision, with a key to all species in the genus and the first use of DNA barcoding for the group. ZooKeys 50: 29-77.
